picked_headlines.summary: Physics-informed neural networks boost safety and efficiency in hydrogen crossover prediction for PEM electrolyzers.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article bridges the gap between AI and engineering by applying neural networks to real-world energy applications, appealing to both technical audiences and stakeholders interested in sustainable technologies.

picked_headlines.summary: Martin Fowler explores AI's transformative role in software engineering, focusing on non-determinism and legacy code.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article provides insights into AI's impact on software engineering practices, making it relevant for both engineers and management looking to understand future trends.

digest:
- *ModernBERT* outperforms general models in patent NLP, enhancing speed and accuracy for specialized tasks. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.14926)
- *RAT* combines RNN efficiency and attention accuracy, improving training speed for long sequences. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2507.04416)
- *VULPO* enhances vulnerability detection with context-aware LLM optimization, outperforming traditional methods. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.11896)
- *MoDES* boosts performance and inference speed in Mixture-of-Experts MLLMs through dynamic expert skipping. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.15690)
- *DevPiolt* improves IoT device operations with LLM-based recommendations, enhancing user experience. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.14227)
- *IMSE* introduces innovative methods for lightweight speech enhancement, achieving better efficiency and performance. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.14515)
- *LeanOS* automates startup operations using AI, supporting both venture and bootstrap business models. [Read more](https://github.com/BellaBe/lean-os)
- *Agentic AI* empowers architectural governance by enabling automated checks and improving oversight. [Read more](https://www.oreilly.com/radar/how-agentic-ai-empowers-architecture-governance/)
